title: Economic Thresholds for Hypera nigrirostris (Coleoptera: Curculionidae) in Red Clover Seed Production from On-Farm Trials
excerpt: This study quantifies economic thresholds for the lesser clover leaf weevil in commercial red clover seed fields through multi-year on-farm trials. Results provide decision-support tools for growers.
citation: Irvine, J. R., Prager, S. M. (2025). "Economic Thresholds for Hypera nigrirostris (Coleoptera: Curculionidae) in Red Clover Seed Production from On-Farm Trials." Journal of Economic Entomology.

title: Effects of Phytoplasma Infection on Aster Leafhopper (Macrosteles quadrilineatus Forbes) (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) Settling Behaviour and Development on Brassica napus
excerpt: This paper examines how phytoplasma infection alters aster leafhopper settling behaviour and development on canola.
citation: Irvine, J. R., Romero, B., Prager, S. M. (2025). "Effects of Phytoplasma Infection on Aster Leafhopper (Macrosteles quadrilineatus Forbes) (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) Settling Behaviour and Development on Brassica napus." Entomologia Experimentalis et Applicata.

title: Climate Change Impact on Agricultural Entomology
venue: Bulletin of the Entomological Society of Canada
excerpt: A synthesis of how climate change is reshaping agricultural pest dynamics and management approaches.
citation: Irvine, J. R., Hartl, T., Prager, S. M. (2025). "Climate Change Impact on Agricultural Entomology." Bulletin of the Entomological Society of Canada, 57(1).

title: Challenges in Undergraduate Research: Pathways to Stronger Graduate Programs
excerpt: This article highlights barriers to undergraduate research access and argues for improvements that strengthen graduate education.
citation: Irvine, J. R. (2025). "Challenges in Undergraduate Research: Pathways to Stronger Graduate Programs." American Entomologist, 71(3).

title: Complementing the Western Scientific Approach with Indigenous Knowledge
excerpt: A perspective on integrating Indigenous knowledge systems with Western science to strengthen ecological research and conservation.
citation: Irvine, J. R. (2024). "Complementing the Western Scientific Approach with Indigenous Knowledge." American Entomologist, 70(1).

title: Economic Thresholds for Lesser Clover Leaf Weevil in Red Clover Seed Production
excerpt: A grower-focused extension summary describing new economic thresholds for lesser clover leaf weevil.
citation: Irvine, J. R., Prager, S. M. (2025). "Economic Thresholds for Lesser Clover Leaf Weevil in Red Clover Seed Production." Forage Seed News, 30(2).
